function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid growth of internet users in china","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of lifestyle changes before, during, and after covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of non-contact interaction applications for urban community development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of non-contact interactions in community planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reshaping of community lifestyles in the post-pandemic period","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importance of community-based spatial unit","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community life circle planning model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage samples from a hospital","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in the study, including small sample size and lack of air sampling for sars-cov-2 rna detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on object surfaces in a hospital isolation ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive stool specimen for sars-cov-2 rna in patient with mechanical ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High hand hygiene compliance of staff and effectiveness of disinfection measures in isolation wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection and cleaning of hospital equipment and surfaces may lead to the transmission of sars-cov-2 and other infectious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of general hospital wards into temporary isolation wards may lead to concerns about infection control and environmental safety.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Generation of respiratory aerosols from medical ventilators increases the risk of occupationally acquired infection among healthcare personnel.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sewage samples positive for sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination in field-settings with sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rt-pcr testing for sars-cov-2 virus detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus isolation and culture in biosafety level 3 bsl-3 laboratory","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in isolation ward environment and staff ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of indoor air and surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and testing of patient and staff samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete environmental sampling and ppe site sampling","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of hospital environment with sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact and droplet secretions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pathogen contamination in the hospital environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on hospital surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support from who in 2003","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of uncontrolled mass travel during holidays","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate case identification, containment, and resource allocation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficult decisions under uncertainty and time constraints","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear health messaging","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Real-time public communications mostly in mandarin chinese and sign language, limited communication in different languages for non-taiwanese citizens","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Permitting the docking of the diamond princess cruise ship with confirmed infections onboard, leading to public panic and concern about community spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the sustainability of intensive public health policies and public reception until the end of the epidemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation and lack of education on contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hoarding masks and medical supplies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate support for schools, businesses, and furloughed workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of border control and case identification leading to unmonitored spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of essential medical equipment like masks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation leading to public anxiety and confusion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proactive case finding and retesting for covid 19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overloading of the hotline system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease stigma and compassion for affected individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity to mainland china and high number of flights increase the risk of covid-19 transmission to taiwan.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constant alert and readiness to act on epidemics arising from china since the 2003 sars epidemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health declaration border pass and mobile phone tracking for immigration clearance and quarantine enforcement.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
